basics.name: Chezney Piersall
basics.label: Low Voltage Technician
basics.summary: I am a low-voltage technician that specializes in low-voltage systems, fiber optics, structured cabling, and ISP infrastructure for residential and commercial projects, with a proven history in telecommunications contracting through ISPs and a commitment to exceptional customer service.
basics.objective: My objective is to secure a long-term position within a reputable organization that offers opportunities for professional growth and advancement. I aim to contribute meaningfully by leveraging my current skills and expertise, while also committing to continuous learning and development to further enhance my capabilities and support the organization’s success.

work.name: Bevo Security Solutions
highlights: * Worked on a team of 5 developers to develop a web application for a client
work.summary:
•  Installed, configured, and maintained low voltage systems, including CCTV, access control, and gate operator systems.
•  Performed wiring, programming, and troubleshooting to ensure reliable operation of security and access systems.
•  Conducted site assessments to determine optimal placement and integration of low voltage equipment.
•  Ensured compliance with safety standards and local regulations during installations and repairs.
•  Provided customer training and technical support to resolve system issues and enhance user experience.

work.name: Comcast Xfinity
highlights: * Worked on a team of 5 developers to develop a web application for a client
work.summary:
•  Installed, tested, and maintained fiber-to-the-home (FTTH) networks for high-speed internet, voice, and video services.
•  Performed splicing, termination, and troubleshooting of fiber optic cables to ensure optimal connectivity.
•  Conducted site surveys and prepared infrastructure for fiber optic installations in residential and commercial settings.

work.name: Piersall Link
highlights: * Worked on a team of 5 developers to develop a web application for a client
work.summary:
•  Ensured compliance with safety standards and industry regulations during installation and maintenance processes.
•  Collaborated with network technicians and provided customer support to resolve connectivity issues efficiently.

•  Collaborated with utility teams and communicated with customers to ensure timely project completion and satisfaction.

work.name: Encore Trailers
work.summary:
•  Supervised and coordinated electrical installation and maintenance teams to ensure efficient production processes.
•  Oversaw wiring, system installations, and quality control for RV electrical components.
•  Trained and mentored staff on safety protocols and technical procedures.

work.name: R.I.C
work.summary:
•  Installed, tested, and maintained fiber-to-the-home (FTTH) networks for high-speed internet, voice, and video services.
•  Performed splicing, termination, and troubleshooting of fiber optic cables to ensure optimal connectivity.
•  Conducted site surveys and prepared infrastructure for fiber optic installations in residential and commercial settings.

work.name: MediaCom
work.summary:
•  Performed advanced installations, maintenance, and repairs of cable television, broadband, and phone services in customer homes and businesses.
•  Diagnosed and resolved complex network issues, ensuring optimal system performance and customer satisfaction.
•  Trained and mentored junior technicians on technical procedures, safety protocols, and customer service standards.
•  Conducted routine maintenance and upgrades of HFC (Hybrid Fiber-Coaxial) plant from node to tap.
•  Collaborated with technical teams to address outages and ensure reliable network connectivity.

work.name: Bison Coach
work.summary:
•  Collaborated with production managers to meet project deadlines and maintain quality standards.
•  Troubleshot and resolved electrical issues to minimize downtime and enhance operational efficiency.
